title: William Maxwell: A Meeting Mr. Mogul Bonus Book
description: ”You don’t know who I am?”  William Maxwell, heir to Maxwell Enterprises, incredulously asked. Incredibly, the new waitress just treated him like any regular joe.  Find out what William thought of sassy Andy in this adorable meet-cute—before you fall in love with them in Meeting Mr. Mogul.
author: Mel Ryle
